name: hlnv

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, chlo), wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c0, ccbn))
stmt.pretty: syl(c0 ∈ CHilOLD, c0 ∈ NrmCVec, c0 ∈ CBan)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, chlo), wcel(c0, cnv))
-| wi(wcel(c0, chlo), wcel(c0, ccbn))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ccbn), wcel(c0, cnv))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CHilOLD → c0 ∈ NrmCVec)
⊣ (c0 ∈ CHilOLD → c0 ∈ CBan)
⊣ (c0 ∈ CBan → c0 ∈ NrmCVec)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, chlo), wcel(c0, cnv))
-| wi(wcel(c0, chlo), wcel(c0, ccbn))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ccbn), wcel(c0, cnv))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CHilOLD → c0 ∈ NrmCVec)
⊣ (c0 ∈ CHilOLD → c0 ∈ CBan)
⊣ (c0 ∈ CBan → c0 ∈ NrmCVec)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, chlo), wcel(c0, cnv))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ccbn), wcel(c0, cnv))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CHilOLD → c0 ∈ NrmCVec)
⊣ (c0 ∈ CBan → c0 ∈ NrmCVec)

comment: Every complex Hilbert space is a normed complex vector space. (Contributed by NM, 17-Mar-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
